Class ComponentUtil

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.ui.util.ComponentUtil

public class ComponentUtil
extends Object

The ComponentUtil class contains utility methods for working with swing components.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dan Dexter

Constructor Summary
ComponentUtil()
           
 
Method Summary
static JFrame getParentJFrame(Component component)
          Returns the parent JFrame of the specified component.
static void setBackground(ButtonGroup buttons, Color bg)
          Sets the background color for the specified ButtonGroup and all the JCheckBox, JComboBox, JButton, and JRadioButton components that it contains to the same color.
static void setBackground(Container c, Color bg)
          Sets the background color for the specified container and all the JPanel, JLabel, JCheckBox, JComboBox, JTextField, JRadioButton, and JScrollPane components that it contains to the same color.

getParentJFrame

public static JFrame getParentJFrame(Component component)
Returns the parent JFrame of the specified component.

Parameters:

Returns:
the parent JFrame.

setBackground

public static void setBackground(Container c,
                                 Color bg)
Sets the background color for the specified container and all the JPanel, JLabel, JCheckBox, JComboBox, JTextField, JRadioButton, and JScrollPane components that it contains to the same color.

Parameters:
c - the container to set the background color of.
bg - the background color.

setBackground

public static void setBackground(ButtonGroup buttons,
                                 Color bg)
Sets the background color for the specified ButtonGroup and all the JCheckBox, JComboBox, JButton, and JRadioButton components that it contains to the same color.

Parameters:
buttons - the button group to set the backgroun for.
bg - the background color.
